name: frontend
description: Frontend Umgebung f√ºr das Beiboot Projekt im Modul Web Technologien im SS 2020

scripts.start:development: sass --watch styles/:public/css & tsc -w --preserveWatchOutput true & esw -w --fix & node --inspect server.js
scripts.start:production: sass styles/:public/css && tsc && npx node-minify -c uglify-es -i public/js/script.js -o public/js/script.js && node server.js

author: Pascal Schorde
